member.name: P:DevExpress.XtraScheduler.UI.ResourcesTree.Columns

summary.para: Provides access to a collection of ResourcesTree columns.

member.value: A ResourceTreeColumnCollection object that is a collection of all the columns within a resources tree control.

member.name: P:DevExpress.XtraScheduler.UI.ResourcesTree.FindPanelVisible

summary.para: Gets or sets whether the Find Panel is visible.

member.value: true if the Find Panel is visible; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.XtraScheduler.UI.ResourcesTree.HorzScrollVisibility

summary.para: Gets or sets whether the horizontal scrollbar should be displayed.

member.value: A enumeration value specifying whether the horizontal scrollbar should be displayed.

summary.para: This member supports the internal infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.

member.name: P:DevExpress.XtraScheduler.UI.ResourcesTree.IsUnboundMode

summary.para: Gets whether the Resources Tree control is in unbound mode.

member.value: true, if the control is in unbound mode, otherwise, false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.XtraScheduler.UI.ResourcesTree.OptionsFilter

summary.para: Provides access to the Resources Tree filtering options.

member.value: An object that contains filter options.

summary.para: Creates Resource Tree columns for all public fields in the bound data source based on the configured resource mappings. This method removes all existing columns.

member.name: P:DevExpress.XtraScheduler.UI.ResourcesTree.RefreshDataOnSchedulerChanges

summary.para: Forces the control to reload its data on every update of the data displayed in the associated SchedulerControl.

member.value: True, to force the ResourcesTree to refresh its data when the data displayed in the SchedulerControl changes; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.XtraScheduler.UI.ResourcesTree.SchedulerControl

summary.para: Gets or sets the SchedulerControl to which the current control is bound.

member.value: A whose resources should be displayed.

member.name: P:DevExpress.XtraScheduler.UI.ResourcesTree.VertScrollVisibility

summary.para: Gets or sets whether the vertical scrollbar is displayed.

member.value: A enumeration member specifying the scrollbar visibility.
